remarks: Lemma 4 for ~ frgrawopreg .  In a friendship graph each vertex with degree K is connected with a vertex with degree other than K. This corresponds to statement 4 in [Huneke] p. 2:  "By the first claim, every vertex in A is adjacent to every vertex in B.".  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Dec-2017.)
statement:

frgrawopreg.b $e |- B = ( V \ A ) $.
frgrawopreglem4 $p |- ( V FriendGrph E -> A. a e. A A. b e. B { a , b } e. ran E ) $.
$d A b x $.
$d E a b x $.
$d K x $.
$d V a b x $.
